title: R{{ROUND_NUMBER}} [Params-Roadmap WG] Prepare Round - Define round parameters
body:
- [ ] Funding Amount
 - [ ] Funding Cap
- [ ] Earmarks
- [ ] Add new round parameters to the [Airtable Funding Rounds Table](https://airtable.com/appVer8ccYGnqSm2H/tbliawPTKlmd1lVA5/viwcabfq70TWi2BVz?blocks=hide)

title: R{{ROUND_NUMBER}} Townhalls setup
body:
- [ ] Create TownHall round {{ROUND_NUMBER}} events

title: R{{ROUND_NUMBER}} [OceanDAO Eng WG] Prepare Round - Site
R{{ROUND_NUMBER}} [OceanDAO Eng WG] Prepare Round - Wiki
body:
- [ ] Update [wiki](https://github.com/oceanprotocol/oceandao/wiki) with round details
 - Add round parameters
 - Port: {{ROUND_PORT_LINK}}
- Funding tiers
- [Important Links](https://github.com/oceanprotocol/oceandao/wiki#important-links) with round notion pages and the calendar

title: R{{ROUND_NUMBER}} [OceanDAO Eng WG] Prepare Round - Google Schedule
R{{ROUND_NUMBER}} [OceanDAO Eng WG] Deploy Round - Communication
body: - [ ] Write a blog post for the new round

title: R{{ROUND_NUMBER}} [OceanDAO Eng WG] Deploy Round - Port
body:
How to open port [video](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1RNa0Sd9tQsN7UqOaMkuELyWIs-ZL8ksu/view?usp=sharing)
 - [ ] Create Port round {{ROUND_NUMBER}} category
- [ ] Port goes live

title: R{{ROUND_NUMBER}} Proposals Submissions - Live-OPS
body:
How to do the live-ops [video](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1dtv3eb6MGU5gwrQpz7nAuRLvaqTqn_T-/view?usp=sharing)
 - [ ] Review Port for new proposals
- [ ] Add proposals to Airtable
- [ ] Make sure every project provided all required informations and it's properly registered
 - [ ] Check up on projects that do not have sufficient OCEAN.
- [ ] Provide proposal summaries to MarCom for tweets.

title: R{{ROUND_NUMBER}} [OceanDAO Eng WG] Deploy Vote - Notion Voting Page
body: - [ ] Integrate GSheet for Round {{ROUND_NUMBER}} in the Notion Voting Page

title: R{{ROUND_NUMBER}} [OceanDAO Eng WG] Submission Deadline - Port
R{{ROUND_NUMBER}} Conclusions - Finance Transactions
body:
- [ ] Transactions to the winners
- [ ] Burn remainder

title: R{{ROUND_NUMBER}} [OceanDAO Eng WG] Conclusions - Communication
body: - [ ] Write a blog post summarizing results/winners
